notes: Deals fire damage.

notes: Deals earth damage.

name: Smoke Rush
notes: Low-level Ancient Magicks spell. Has a 25% chance to poison the target.

name: Shadow Rush
notes: Low-level Ancient Magicks spell. Has a 25% chance to reduce the target's Attack level.

name: Blood Rush
notes: Low-level Ancient Magicks spell. Heals the caster for 25% of the damage dealt.

name: Ice Rush
notes: Low-level Ancient Magicks spell. Has a 25% chance to freeze the target for 5 seconds.

name: Smoke Burst
notes: Mid-level Ancient Magicks spell. Has a 50% chance to poison the target.

name: Shadow Burst
notes: Mid-level Ancient Magicks spell. Has a 50% chance to reduce the target's Attack level.

name: Blood Burst
notes: Mid-level Ancient Magicks spell. Heals the caster for 25% of the damage dealt.

name: Ice Burst
notes: Mid-level Ancient Magicks spell. Has a 50% chance to freeze the target for 10 seconds.

name: Smoke Blitz
notes: High-level Ancient Magicks spell. Has a 75% chance to poison the target.

name: Shadow Blitz
notes: High-level Ancient Magicks spell. Has a 75% chance to reduce the target's Attack level.

name: Blood Blitz
notes: High-level Ancient Magicks spell. Heals the caster for 25% of the damage dealt.

name: Ice Blitz
notes: High-level Ancient Magicks spell. Has a 75% chance to freeze the target for 15 seconds.

name: Smoke Barrage
notes: Highest-level Ancient Magicks spell. Always poisons the target.

name: Shadow Barrage
notes: Highest-level Ancient Magicks spell. Always reduces the target's Attack level.

name: Blood Barrage
notes: Highest-level Ancient Magicks spell. Heals the caster for 50% of the damage dealt.

name: Ice Barrage
notes: Highest-level Ancient Magicks spell. Always freezes the target for 20 seconds.

name: Confuse
notes: Reduces the target's Attack level by 5%.

name: Weaken
notes: Reduces the target's Strength level by 5%.

name: Curse
notes: Reduces the target's Defence level by 5%.

name: Vulnerability
notes: Reduces the target's Defence level by 10%.

name: Enfeeble
notes: Reduces the target's Strength level by 10%.

name: Stun
notes: Reduces the target's Attack level by 10%.

name: Bind
notes: Roots the target in place for 5 seconds.

name: Snare
notes: Roots the target in place for 10 seconds.

name: Entangle
notes: Roots the target in place for 15 seconds.

name: Tele Block
notes: Prevents the target from using most forms of teleportation for 5 minutes.

name: Arceuus Strike
notes: A basic spell from the Arceuus spellbook.

name: Reanimate Dragon
notes: Allows the user to reanimate an ensouled dragon head. Requires 100% Arceuus favour.

name: Inferior Demonbane
notes: A demonbane spell that deals additional damage to demons. Requires 40% Arceuus favour.

name: Dark Lure
notes: Used in the Hunt for Red Raktuber quest. Requires 50% Arceuus favour.

name: Ghostly Grasp
notes: Basic Arceuus combat spell.

name: Skeletal Grasp
notes: Arceuus combat spell.

name: Undead Grasp
notes: Strong Arceuus combat spell.

name: Resurrect Lesser Ghost
notes: Summons a Lesser Ghost Thrall to fight for you. Requires 40% Arceuus favour.

name: Resurrect Lesser Skeleton
notes: Summons a Lesser Skeleton Thrall to fight for you. Requires 60% Arceuus favour.

name: Resurrect Lesser Zombie
notes: Summons a Lesser Zombie Thrall to fight for you. Requires 80% Arceuus favour.

name: Resurrect Superior Ghost
notes: Summons a Superior Ghost Thrall to fight for you. Requires 40% Arceuus favour.

name: Resurrect Superior Skeleton
notes: Summons a Superior Skeleton Thrall to fight for you. Requires 60% Arceuus favour.

name: Resurrect Superior Zombie
notes: Summons a Superior Zombie Thrall to fight for you. Requires 80% Arceuus favour.

name: Resurrect Greater Ghost
notes: Summons a Greater Ghost Thrall to fight for you. Requires 40% Arceuus favour.

name: Resurrect Greater Skeleton
notes: Summons a Greater Skeleton Thrall to fight for you. Requires 60% Arceuus favour.

name: Resurrect Greater Zombie
notes: Summons a Greater Zombie Thrall to fight for you. Requires 80% Arceuus favour.
